It is unlikely that this facility be utilised but may be necessary where a Nominee Co. is not controlled by the Bank concerned. Where entered at a Companies' Standard default Level the System will automatically create New Issue Transactions with an inherent Nominee Code relating to the Code as entered here. Validation Rules1-5 Alpha numeric characters, (type SS) Standard nominee code. Optional input.Must exist as a valid Nominee Code.
properties.name: NOMINEE_CODE

properties.documentation: Standard default for the delivery of the new issue. Whenever New Issue Transactions are created by the System they will automatically assume the Delivery Instructions as contained within the Standard Default Tables. Examples: Receive new issue against payment delivery free of payment. Validation Rules1-5 Alpha numeric characters, (type S). Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Security Delivery Instruction (SC. DEL. Instr) code.
properties.name: DELIVERY_INSTR

properties.documentation: Default transaction code for all Security Credit type entries with this application. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: SEC_CR_TRANS_CODE

properties.documentation: Default transaction code for all Security Debit type entries within this application. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: SEC_DR_TRANS_CODE

properties.documentation: Bank's own account for posting cost and proceeds for any New Issue transaction. Internal Account or New Issues' Account for default purposes when processing New Issues. Validation RulesStandard account format. Optional input.Must exist as a valid Account Number.
properties.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_NO

properties.documentation: Date by which replies must be received in order for Subscribers to any New Issue to be considered for possible allotment by the Issuing agent concerned. Validation RulesStandard Date format. Mandatory input.
properties.name: REPLY_DATE

properties.documentation: Specifies the category code to be used for the posting of exchange Profit & Loss entries. This code classifies profit & loss and product types. Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that give an accurate view of the bank's position. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must be in range 50-000 to 59-999.Must exist as a valid CATEGORY code.
properties.name: EXCHANGE_PL_CAT

properties.documentation: The transaction code used to signify which type of transaction is being posted, for exchange Profits. To facilitate the recognition of the transaction code numbers with the application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each application. The following range has been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: EXCHANGE_PL_CR_CD

properties.documentation: The transaction code used to signify which type of transaction is being posted, for exchange Losses. To facilitate the recognition of the transaction code numbers with the application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each application. The following range has been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: EXCHANGE_PL_DB_CD

properties.documentation: Standard T24 numeric field. Validation RulesMandatory input.A maximum of 6 characters may be entered.Must be the key to a valid entry on the CATEGORY file.

classes.documentation: This table contains company level default values which will be used when processing coupon, dividend, interest payments. These defaults will be applicable irrespective of the transaction type and the user must create one record for each company on the system.

properties.documentation: Specifies the Company to which the User must be Signed On in order to use the Application. Validation Rules9 alphanumeric characters 'CCGGGLLLL' where: CC is 2 alpha characters Country Code GGG is 3 numeric characters Company Group LLLL is 4 numeric local code. or 2-3 type MNE (uppercase alphanumeric or '.') Company Mnemonic characters. Mandatory input. No Default Value.
properties.name: COMPANY_CODE

properties.documentation: Details the type of Dividend Payment involved for processing transactions. As with ordinary Dividend Detail input screens the Dividend type forms part of the key to access the input screens. It is only envisaged that the SYSTEM will default on this Dividend type when processing Automatic dividend creation by using the DIV.AUT.REQ Application. Validation Rules1-5 Alpha numeric type. Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Dividend Coupon Type (DIV.COUP.TYPE).
properties.name: DIV_TYPE_BOND

properties.documentation: If entered this will be the value adopted as the standard for all normal dividend transactions. Note: Great care should be taken when setting up these defaults since the nominee forms part of the key under which security positions are stored. Validation Rules1-5 Alpha numeric character nominee code. Optional input.Must exist as a valid Nominee Code.
properties.name: DIV_TYPE_SHARE

properties.documentation: If required when processing a Dividend/Coupon payment this is the system default value for the delivery instructions (should there be any which is not likely). Could be set up for example as a Transaction with payment only and no delivery. Validation Rules1-5 Alpha numeric character Security Delivery instruction. Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Delivery Instruction (SC.DEL.INSTR) code.
properties.name: NOMINEE_CODE

properties.documentation: Specifies the System default value for all Dr type transactions with the Dividend/Coupon/Int payment application. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Security Transaction Name (SC.TRANS.NAME).
properties.name: DELIVERY_INSTR

properties.documentation: Specifies the system default transaction code for all Depository Credit type transactions within the Coupon/Interest payment application. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Security Transaction Name (SC.TRANS.NAME)
properties.name: SEC_DR_TR_CODE_CPN

properties.documentation: Default category code for all foreign charges payable by the client receiving an interest/dividend payment. This code classifies profit and loss and product types. Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that give an accurate view of the bank's operation. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters. a) Product/P&L classification in the range 1-99. b) Sub-classification of product/P&L in the range 000-999. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Category Code.
properties.name: SEC_DR_TR_CODE_DIV

properties.documentation: Transaction code for all Foreign Charges which are to be 'credited' to a client with the Dividend/Interest payment section. For "credit" read Reversal (cancellation). Validation Rules1-3 numeric digit Transaction code. Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: DEP_CR_TR_CODE_CPN

properties.documentation: Default category code for all foreign charges payable/chargeable by the Depository involved in any coupon/div interest payment. This code classifies profit and loss and product types. Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that given an accurate view of the bank's operation. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters: a) Product/P&L classification in the range 1-99. b) Sub-classification of product/P&L in the range 000-999. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Category Code.
properties.name: DEP_CR_TR_CODE_DIV

properties.documentation: Transaction code for all foreign charges debited to a Depository within a coupon/dividend interest payment transaction. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Transaction Type.
properties.name: CL_FOR_CATEGORY

properties.documentation: Internal suspense account used for processing Dividend payment accounting entries. While all client credits are posted to their appropriate account number the corresponding Dr will rest on this suspense account until all entries for that particular payment are authorised; whereupon it will be posted to the relevant nostro account. Validation Rules1-10 Alpha numeric characters. Mandatory input.Must exist as a valid Account Class Code.
properties.name: CL_FOR_CR_CODE

properties.documentation: Default commission rate for all payments within this application. This rate will automatically default to field 14 (commission percentage) on the Dividend Detail record being input. However as with all standard default commission and brokerage rates it can be altered at transaction level. Validation Rules1-15 character Standard Rate format. Up to 6 integers and decimal points. Optional input.
properties.name: DP_FOR_CATEGORY

properties.documentation: Used for storing the 'Bank's' standard minimum commission on any payment within this application. Validation Rules1-15 character Standard amount format. Optional input.
properties.name: DP_FOR_DR_CODE

properties.documentation: Default category code for all client commission charges with the application. This code classifies profit and loss and product types. Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that give an accurate view of the bank's operation. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters: a) Product/P&L classification in the range 1-99. b) Sub-classification of product/P&L in the range 000-999. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Category code.
properties.name: DEPO_SUSP_ACC

properties.documentation: Credit Transaction code for all client commission entries within this application. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Transaction code.
properties.name: STANDARD_COMM_RATE

properties.documentation: Default category code for all Depository (foreign) charges within this application. This code classifies profit and loss and product types. Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that give an accurate view of the bank's operation. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters: a) Product/P&L classification in the range 1-99. b) Sub-classification of product/P&L in the range 000-999. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Category code.
properties.name: MINIMUM_COMM

properties.documentation: Debit transaction code for all Depository (Foreign) charges within this application. The following ranges have been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. To facilitate the recognition of the Transaction code number with the Application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each Application as specified in the details. (Mandatory input).Must exist as a valid Transaction code.
properties.name: CL_CHG_CATEGORY

Envisaged that for customers in Switzerland Standard Default Table will cause this no. to be printed in client's advices. Although optional within the default table it is a mandatory input at transaction level (i.e. Div.Coup.Del). Validation Rules1-8 Alpha numeric characters. Defaults to standard defaults file SC.STD.DIV.COUP. (Optional input).

Each business transaction of T24 will be allocated a Category code which will enable reports to be constructed that give an accurate view of the bank's position. Validation Rules4 or 5 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must be in range 50-000 to 59-999.Must exist as a valid CATEGORY code.
properties.name: DP_CHG_CATEGORY

properties.documentation: The transaction code used to signify which type of transaction is being posted, for exchange Profits. To facilitate the recognition of the transaction code numbers with the application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each application. The following range has been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.
properties.name: DP_CHG_DR_CODE

properties.documentation: The transaction code used to signify which type of transaction is being posted, for exchange Losses. To facilitate the recognition of the transaction code numbers with the application to which they refer, ranges have been assigned to each application. The following range has been assigned within T24: 600 - 649 = Securities. Validation Rules1-3 numeric characters. Mandatory Input.Must exist as a valid Transaction Code.

properties.documentation: Validation RulesA maximum of 16 characters may be entered.
